short_summary: The request for a Standing Offer (RFSO) for the rental, transportation, maintenance, and emptying of chemical toilets in Quebec, Canada.
description: This RFSO is issued by Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence, and the contract will be for the rental, transportation, maintenance, and emptying of chemical toilets located in Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.

Chemical Toilets Rental, Maintenance and Emptying
full_summary:
====================================================
### W0106-22J031: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Portable Chemical Toilets Rental Services

#### General Information

* **Reference Number** : WS3831583479-Doc3978935931
* **Publication Date** : May 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date** : May 30, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : N/A (see below)
* **Expected Contract End Date** : June 30, 2024

#### Service Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites contractors to submit bids for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the rental, transportation, maintenance, and disposal of portable chemical toilets located in Quebec.

#### Tender Terms and Conditions

* **Procurement Method** : Competitive, open bidding
* **Bid Evaluation Criteria** : Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements** : Applies to the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others (see below)
* *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* *... and other 22 trade agreements

#### Service Requirements

The contractor must provide the following services:

* Rental of portable chemical toilets
* Transportation of portable chemical toilets
* Maintenance of portable chemical toilets
* Disposal of portable chemical toilets

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this RFSO, please contact Lisa-Marie Julien, Procurement Specialist at PWGSC:

* Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

Note: Trade Agreements are approved by the Canadian government and include the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other agreements listed in the rewritten text. A full list of trade agreements is not provided as it is very extensive. In your reph
